TypeSignature.Value: type HttpCookie = class inherit Object interface ICloneable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable
public sealed class HttpCookie : Java.Lang.Object, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, Java.Lang.ICloneable

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCookie extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class Java.Lang.ICloneable, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: An HttpCookie object represents an HTTP cookie, which carries state information between server and user agent.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

a String specifying the value of the cookie

Docs.returns: a clone of this HTTP cookie

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Comment : string with get, set

Docs.param: a String specifying the comment to display to the user
Docs.summary: Returns the comment describing the purpose of this cookie, or null if the cookie has no comment. -or- Specifies a comment that describes a cookie's purpose.
Docs.value: a String containing the comment, or null if none

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.CommentURL : string with get, set

Docs.param: a String specifying the comment URL to display to the user
Docs.summary: Returns the comment URL describing the purpose of this cookie, or null if the cookie has no comment URL. -or- Specifies a comment URL that describes a cookie's purpose.
Docs.value: a String containing the comment URL, or null if none

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Discard : bool with get, set

Docs.param: true indicates to discard cookie unconditionally
Docs.summary: Returns the discard attribute of the cookie -or- Specify whether user agent should discard the cookie unconditionally.
Docs.value: a boolean to represent this cookie's discard attribute

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Domain : string with get, set

Docs.param: a String containing the domain name within which this cookie is visible; form is according to RFC 2965
Docs.summary: Returns the domain name set for this cookie. -or- Specifies the domain within which this cookie should be presented.
Docs.value: a String containing the domain name

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Reports whether this HTTP cookie has expired or not.
Docs.value: true to indicate this HTTP cookie has expired; otherwise, false

MemberSignature.Value: member this.HttpOnly : bool with get, set

Docs.param: if true make the cookie HTTP only, i.e. only visible as part of an HTTP request.
Docs.summary: Returns true if this cookie contains the HttpOnly attribute. -or- Indicates whether the cookie should be considered HTTP Only.
Docs.value: true if this cookie should be considered HTTPOnly

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MaxAge : int64 with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns the maximum age of the cookie, specified in seconds. -or- Sets the maximum age of the cookie in seconds.
Docs.value: an integer specifying the maximum age of the cookie in seconds

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the name of the cookie.
Docs.value: a String specifying the cookie's name

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Java.Net.HttpCookie> Parse(string header) cil managed

Docs.param: a String specifying the set-cookie header. The header should start with "set-cookie", or "set-cookie2" token; or it should have no leading token at all.
Docs.summary: Constructs cookies from set-cookie or set-cookie2 header string.
Docs.returns: a List of cookie parsed from header line string

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the string does not comply with cookie specification, or the cookie name contains illegal characters, or reserved tokens of cookie specification appears

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Path : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Returns the path on the server to which the browser returns this cookie. -or- Specifies a path for the cookie to which the client should return the cookie.
Docs.value: a String specifying a path that contains a servlet name, for example, /catalog

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Portlist : string with get, set

Docs.param: a String specify the port list, which is comma separated series of digits
Docs.summary: Returns the port list attribute of the cookie -or- Specify the portlist of the cookie, which restricts the port(s) to which a cookie may be sent back in a Cookie header.
Docs.value: a String contains the port list or null if none

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Secure : bool with get, set

Docs.param: If true, the cookie can only be sent over a secure protocol like HTTPS. If false, it can be sent over any protocol.
Docs.summary: Returns true if sending this cookie should be restricted to a secure protocol, or false if the it can be sent using any protocol. -or- Indicates whether the cookie should only be sent using a secure protocol, such as HTTPS or SSL.
Docs.value: false if the cookie can be sent over any standard protocol; otherwise, true

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Value : string with get, set

Docs.param: a String specifying the new value
Docs.summary: Returns the value of the cookie. -or- Assigns a new value to a cookie after the cookie is created.
Docs.value: a String containing the cookie's present value

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Version : int with get, set

Docs.param: 0 if the cookie should comply with the original Netscape specification; 1 if the cookie should comply with RFC 2965/2109
Docs.summary: Returns the version of the protocol this cookie complies with. -or- Sets the version of the cookie protocol this cookie complies with.
Docs.value: 0 if the cookie complies with the original Netscape specification; 1 if the cookie complies with RFC 2965/2109
